Ganesh Mantra (Full).sanskrit:
ॐ गं गणपतये नमः।
वक्रतुण्ड महाकाय सूर्यकोटि समप्रभ।
निर्विघ्नं कुरु मे देव सर्वकार्येषु सर्वदा॥
Ganesh Mantra (Full).transliteration:
Om Gam Ganapataye Namah.
Vakratunda Mahākāya Sūryakoṭi Samaprabha,
Nirvighnaṁ Kuru Me Deva Sarvakāryeṣu Sarvadā.
Ganesh Mantra (Full).english: Salutations to Lord Ganesha. O large-bodied one with a curved trunk, shining like a million suns, please remove all obstacles from my endeavors, always.

Shiva Mantra (Full).sanskrit:
ॐ नमः शिवाय।
नागेन्द्रहाराय त्रिलोचनाय भस्माङ्गरागाय महेश्वराय।
नित्याय शुद्धाय दिगम्बराय तस्मै न काराय नमः शिवाय॥
Shiva Mantra (Full).transliteration:
Om Namah Śivāya.
Nāgendrahārāya Trilocanāya Bhasmāṅgarāgāya Maheśvarāya,
Nityāya Śuddhāya Digambarāya Tasmai Na Kārāya Namah Śivāya.
Shiva Mantra (Full).english: I bow to Lord Shiva, the auspicious one, who wears serpents as garlands, has three eyes, is adorned with holy ash, ever pure, the great Lord clothed in space itself.

Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra (Full).sanskrit:
ॐ त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम्।
उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान्मृत्योर्मुक्षीय माऽमृतात्॥
Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra (Full).transliteration:
Om Tryambakaṁ Yajāmahe Sugandhiṁ Puṣṭivardhanam,
Urvārukamiva Bandhanān Mṛtyor Mukṣīya Mā'mṛtāt.
Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra (Full).english: We worship the three-eyed Lord Shiva, who nourishes and sustains all beings. May He free us from the bondage of worldly attachments and death, bestowing us with immortality.

Vishnu Mantra (Full).sanskrit:
ॐ नमो भगवते वासुदेवाय।
शान्ताकारं भुजगशयनं पद्मनाभं सुरेशं।
विश्वाधारं गगनसदृशं मेघवर्णं शुभाङ्गम्॥
Vishnu Mantra (Full).transliteration:
Om Namo Bhagavate Vāsudevāya.
Śāntākāraṁ Bhujagaśayanaṁ Padmanābhaṁ Sureśam,
Viśvādhāraṁ Gaganasadṛśaṁ Meghavarṇaṁ Śubhāṅgam.
Vishnu Mantra (Full).english: Salutations to Lord Vishnu, the preserver. He is of peaceful form, resting on the serpent, lotus-naveled, the Lord of all gods, support of the universe, vast like the sky, cloud-hued and auspicious in form.

Durga Mantra (Full).sanskrit:
ॐ दुं दुर्गायै नमः।
या देवी सर्वभूतेषु शक्तिरूपेण संस्थिता।
नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमो नमः॥
Durga Mantra (Full).transliteration:
Om Dum Durgāyai Namah.
Yā Devī Sarvabhūteṣu Śaktirūpeṇa Saṁsthitā,
Namastasyai Namastasyai Namastasyai Namo Namah.
Durga Mantra (Full).english: Salutations to Goddess Durga. We bow repeatedly to the Divine Mother who resides in all beings in the form of power and energy.

Hanuman Mantra (Full).sanskrit:
ॐ हं हनुमते नमः।
मनोजवं मारुततुल्यवेगं जितेन्द्रियं बुद्धिमतां वरिष्ठम्।
वातात्मजं वानरयूथमुख्यं श्रीरामदूतं शरणं प्रपद्ये॥
Hanuman Mantra (Full).transliteration:
Om Haṁ Hanumate Namah.
Manojavaṁ Mārutatulyavegaṁ Jitendriyaṁ Buddhimatāṁ Variṣṭham,
Vātātmajaṁ Vānarayūthamukhyaṁ Śrīrāmadūtaṁ Śaraṇaṁ Prapadye.
Hanuman Mantra (Full).english: Salutations to Lord Hanuman. I take refuge in Hanuman, son of the Wind God, swift as the mind, fast as the wind, master of the senses, chief among the wise, the foremost among monkeys, and the great messenger of Lord Rama.

Gayatri Mantra (Full).sanskrit:
ॐ भूर्भुवः स्वः।
तत्सवितुर्वरेण्यं।
भर्गो देवस्य धीमहि।
धियो यो नः प्रचोदयात्॥
Gayatri Mantra (Full).transliteration:
Om Bhur Bhuvaḥ Svaḥ,
Tat Savitur Vareṇyaṁ,
Bhargo Devasya Dhīmahi,
Dhiyo Yo Naḥ Pracodayāt.
Gayatri Mantra (Full).english: We meditate upon the divine radiance of Savitur, the Sun God. May that supreme light inspire and enlighten our intellect.
